CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data

u.a: INV explains where the camera is located as MOT and CHI enter room . MOT holds CHI by the hand

INV enters the room at 10:21:02 and then leaves the room while Small Activity takes place and re-enters at 10:27:19 . INV puts toys from Small Scale Activity away
